Download all files with signatures
In order for the user to be able to download all the attached files and their signatures, you need to configure the
Download all files with all signatures
action. The action is used when working with the File type.
The
Download all files with all signatures
is the standard
custom action
. To configure the action, you need to:
Go to the Actions registry. For more information, refer to
working with registries
.
Create a new action by clicking
of the registry. The System will display a form to enter the action parameters.

action parameters
required.

Download all files with all signatures
action has the key module â€“

4. When specifying the object type, you can override the action name and set the algorithms for the
visibility and locking
button.
5. Save the settings you made.
The action is displayed to the user according to the
settings completed
. The button is called
Download files with signatures
, unless otherwise specified. If you configure other actions for downloading, the buttons will be automatically grouped in the
Download
drop-down list.
The action can be displayed using the
"Button" widget
.
